00101 BOOLEAN EnterFloristGallery()
00102 {
00103       InitFloristDefaults();
00104 
00105       //the next previous buttons
00106       guiFloralGalleryButtonImage   = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\FloristButtons.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00107 
00108       guiFloralGalleryButton[0] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiFloralGalleryButtonImage, sFloristGalleryText[FLORIST_GALLERY_PREV], FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_FONT, 
00109                                                                                FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_UP_COLOR, FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00110                                                                                FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_DOWN_COLOR, FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00111                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00112                                                                                FLOR_GALLERY_BACK_BUTTON_X, FLOR_GALLERY_BACK_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00113                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnFloralGalleryBackButtonCallback);
00114       SetButtonCursor(guiFloralGalleryButton[0], CURSOR_WWW );
00115 
00116       guiFloralGalleryButton[1] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiFloralGalleryButtonImage, sFloristGalleryText[FLORIST_GALLERY_NEXT], FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_FONT, 
00117                                                                                FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_UP_COLOR, FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00118                                                                                FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_DOWN_COLOR, FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00119                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00120                                                                                FLOR_GALLERY_NEXT_BUTTON_X, FLOR_GALLERY_NEXT_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00121                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnFloralGalleryNextButtonCallback);
00122       SetButtonCursor(guiFloralGalleryButton[1], CURSOR_WWW );
00123 
00124       RenderFloristGallery();
00125 
00126       InitFlowerButtons();
00127 
00128       return(TRUE);
00129 }

00131 void ExitFloristGallery()
00132 {
00133       UINT16 i;
00134 
00135       RemoveFloristDefaults();
00136 
00137       for(i=0; i<2; i++)
00138             RemoveButton( guiFloralGalleryButton[i] );
00139 
00140       UnloadButtonImage( guiFloralGalleryButtonImage  );
00141 
00142       DeleteFlowerButtons();
00143 
00144 }

00146 void HandleFloristGallery()
00147 {
00148       if( gfRedrawFloristGallery )
00149       {
00150             gfRedrawFloristGallery=FALSE;
00151 
00152             //
00153             DeleteFlowerButtons();
00154             InitFlowerButtons();
00155 
00156             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00157       }
00158 
00159 }

00161 void RenderFloristGallery()
00162 {
00163       DisplayFloristDefaults();
00164 
00165       DrawTextToScreen(sFloristGalleryText[FLORIST_GALLERY_CLICK_TO_ORDER], FLOR_GALLERY_TITLE_TEXT_X, FLOR_GALLERY_TITLE_TEXT_Y, FLOR_GALLERY_TITLE_TEXT_WIDTH, FLOR_GALLERY_TITLE_FONT, FLOR_GALLERY_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED    );
00166       DrawTextToScreen(sFloristGalleryText[FLORIST_GALLERY_ADDIFTIONAL_FEE], FLOR_GALLERY_TITLE_TEXT_X, FLOR_GALLERY_TITLE_TEXT_Y+11, FLOR_GALLERY_TITLE_TEXT_WIDTH, FLOR_GALLERY_TITLE_FONT, FLOR_GALLERY_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00167 
00168       DisplayFloralDescriptions();
00169 
00170   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00171       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00172   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00173 }

00176 void BtnFloralGalleryNextButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00177 {
00178       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00179       {
00180             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00181             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00182       }
00183       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00184       {
00185             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00186             {
00187                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00188 
00189 
00190                   if( (gubCurFlowerIndex + 3 ) <= FLOR_GALLERY_NUMBER_FLORAL_IMAGES )
00191                         gubCurFlowerIndex += 3;
00192 
00193                   ChangingFloristGallerySubPage( gubCurFlowerIndex );
00194 
00195                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00196 
00197                   gfRedrawFloristGallery = TRUE;
00198             }
00199       }
00200       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00201       {
00202             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00203             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00204       }
00205 } 
00206 
00207 
00208 void BtnFloralGalleryBackButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00209 {
00210       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00211       {
00212             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00213             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00214       }
00215       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00216       {
00217             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00218             {
00219                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00220 
00221 
00222                   if( gubCurFlowerIndex != 0 )
00223                   {
00224                         if( gubCurFlowerIndex >=3 )
00225                               gubCurFlowerIndex -= 3;
00226                         else
00227                               gubCurFlowerIndex = 0;
00228 
00229                         ChangingFloristGallerySubPage( gubCurFlowerIndex );
00230                   }
00231                   else
00232                   {
00233                         guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST;
00234                   }
00235 
00236                   gfRedrawFloristGallery = TRUE;
00237 
00238                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00239             }
00240       }
00241       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00242       {
00243             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00244             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00245       }
00246 }

00249 
00250 void BtnGalleryFlowerButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00251 {
00252       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00253       {
00254             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00255             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00256       }
00257       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00258       {
00259             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00260             {
00261                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00262 
00263                   guiCurrentlySelectedFlower = (UINT8) MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
00264                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST_ORDERFORM;
00265 
00266                   gfShowBookmarks = FALSE;
00267 
00268                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00269             }
00270       }
00271       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00272       {
00273             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00274             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00275       }
00276 }

00278 
00279 BOOLEAN InitFlowerButtons()
00280 {
00281       UINT16 i,j, count;
00282       UINT16 usPosY;
00283       char        sTemp[40];
00284   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00285 
00286       
00287       if( (FLOR_GALLERY_NUMBER_FLORAL_IMAGES - gubCurFlowerIndex) >= 3 )
00288             gubCurNumberOfFlowers = 3;
00289       else
00290             gubCurNumberOfFlowers = FLOR_GALLERY_NUMBER_FLORAL_IMAGES - gubCurFlowerIndex;
00291 
00292       gubPrevNumberOfFlowers = gubCurNumberOfFlowers;
00293 
00294       //the 10 pictures of the flowers
00295       count = gubCurFlowerIndex;
00296       for(i=0; i<gubCurNumberOfFlowers; i++)
00297       {
00298             // load the handbullet graphic and add it
00299             sprintf( sTemp, "LAPTOP\\Flower_%d.sti", count);
00300             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00301             FilenameForBPP(sTemp, VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00302             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiFlowerImages[i]));
00303             count++;
00304       }
00305 
00306       //the buttons with the flower pictures on them
00307       usPosY = FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_BUTTON_Y;
00308 //    usPosX = FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_BUTTON_X;
00309       count = gubCurFlowerIndex;
00310       guiGalleryButtonImage   = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\GalleryButtons.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00311       for(j=0; j<gubCurNumberOfFlowers; j++)
00312       {
00313             guiGalleryButton[j] = QuickCreateButton( guiGalleryButtonImage, FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_BUTTON_X, usPosY,
00314                                                                                                       BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00315                                                                                                       DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGalleryFlowerButtonCallback);
00316             SetButtonCursor( guiGalleryButton[j], CURSOR_WWW);
00317             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiGalleryButton[j], 0, count);
00318 
00319             SpecifyButtonIcon( guiGalleryButton[j], guiFlowerImages[ j ], 0, 5, 5, FALSE );
00320             usPosY += FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_BUTTON_OFFSET_Y;
00321             count ++;
00322       }
00323 
00324       //if its the first page, display the 'back' text  in place of the 'prev' text on the top left button
00325       if( gubCurFlowerIndex == 0 )
00326             SpecifyButtonText( guiFloralGalleryButton[0], sFloristGalleryText[FLORIST_GALLERY_HOME] );
00327       else
00328             SpecifyButtonText( guiFloralGalleryButton[0], sFloristGalleryText[FLORIST_GALLERY_PREV] );
00329 
00330       //if it is the last page disable the next button
00331       if( gubCurFlowerIndex == FLOR_GALLERY_NUMBER_FLORAL_IMAGES-1 )
00332             DisableButton( guiFloralGalleryButton[1] );
00333       else
00334             EnableButton( guiFloralGalleryButton[1] );
00335 
00336 
00337       return(TRUE);
00338 }
00339 
00340 
00341 void DeleteFlowerButtons()
00342 {
00343       UINT16 i;
00344 
00345       for(i=0; i<gubPrevNumberOfFlowers; i++)
00346       {
00347             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiFlowerImages[i] );
00348       }
00349 
00350       UnloadButtonImage( guiGalleryButtonImage );
00351 
00352       for(i=0; i<gubPrevNumberOfFlowers; i++)
00353       {
00354             RemoveButton( guiGalleryButton[i] );
00355       }
00356 
00357 }

00359 
00360 BOOLEAN DisplayFloralDescriptions()
00361 {
00362       wchar_t           sTemp[ 640 ];
00363       UINT32      uiStartLoc=0, i;
00364       UINT16      usPosY, usPrice;
00365 
00366       if( (FLOR_GALLERY_NUMBER_FLORAL_IMAGES - gubCurFlowerIndex) >= 3 )
00367             gubCurNumberOfFlowers = 3;
00368       else
00369             gubCurNumberOfFlowers = FLOR_GALLERY_NUMBER_FLORAL_IMAGES - gubCurFlowerIndex;
00370 
00371       usPosY = FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_BUTTON_Y;
00372       for(i=0; i<gubCurNumberOfFlowers; i++)
00373       {
00374             //Display Flower title
00375             uiStartLoc = FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_TOTAL_SIZE * (i + gubCurFlowerIndex);
00376             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_FILE, sTemp, uiStartLoc, FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_TITLE_SIZE);
00377             DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_TITLE_X, (UINT16)(usPosY+FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_TITLE_OFFSET_Y), 0, FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_TITLE_FONT, FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED  );
00378 
00379             //Display Flower Price
00380             uiStartLoc = FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_TOTAL_SIZE * (i + gubCurFlowerIndex) + FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_TITLE_SIZE;
00381             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_FILE, sTemp, uiStartLoc, FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_PRICE_SIZE);
00382             swscanf( sTemp, L"%hu", &usPrice);
00383             swprintf( sTemp, L"$%d.00 %s", usPrice, pMessageStrings[ MSG_USDOLLAR_ABBREVIATION ] );
00384             DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_TITLE_X, (UINT16)(usPosY+FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_PRICE_OFFSET_Y), 0, FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_PRICE_FONT, FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_PRICE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED  );
00385 
00386             //Display Flower Desc
00387             uiStartLoc = FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_TOTAL_SIZE * (i + gubCurFlowerIndex) + FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_TITLE_SIZE + FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_PRICE_SIZE;
00388             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_FILE, sTemp, uiStartLoc, FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_DESC_SIZE);
00389             DisplayWrappedString(FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_TITLE_X, (UINT16)(usPosY+FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_DESC_OFFSET_Y), FLOR_GALLERY_DESC_WIDTH, 2, FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_DESC_FONT, FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_DESC_COLOR,  sTemp, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00390 
00391             usPosY += FLOR_GALLERY_FLOWER_BUTTON_OFFSET_Y;
00392       }
00393 
00394       return(TRUE);
00395 }
00396 
00397 
00398 void ChangingFloristGallerySubPage( UINT8 ubSubPageNumber )
00399 {
00400       fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
00401 
00402       //there are 3 flowers per page
00403       if( ubSubPageNumber == FLOR_GALLERY_NUMBER_FLORAL_IMAGES )
00404             ubSubPageNumber = 4;
00405       else
00406             ubSubPageNumber = ubSubPageNumber / 3;
00407 
00408       if( FloristGallerySubPagesVisitedFlag[ ubSubPageNumber ] == FALSE )
00409       {
00410             fConnectingToSubPage = TRUE;
00411             fFastLoadFlag = FALSE;
00412 
00413             FloristGallerySubPagesVisitedFlag[ ubSubPageNumber ] = TRUE;
00414       }
00415       else
00416       {
00417             fConnectingToSubPage = TRUE;
00418             fFastLoadFlag = TRUE;
00419       }
00420 }
